description:
****NOTE: this app is also free look for "Simple Stopwatch With Bible Verse," However if you want to support a college student learning how to program mobile apps than buy this one.****
StopWatch Elite is a very simple yet gorgeous fully functional stopwatch. This app not only looks great, but it also features Bible Verses that you can read as the app runs. This app supports landscape view, with highlighted lap times included. StopWatch Elite will be updated often with more verses, as well as additional functionality. Please leave in you comments, suggestions of things that you would like to see implemented in future updates
